fields.title: How It Works
fields.content:
Employers


How We Help You Hire Outsourced Employees to Grow Your Online Business


OutsourceFactor connects employers with talented candidates.  We give you an easy way to outsource work

Regular employees are better than task-doing freelancers.  

Instead of hiring freelancers to do a task and move onto the next job, we encourage you to think differently.  Hire someone to work for you on a regular, ongoing basis.  It could be full time or part time.  But it’s consistent.  You get to teach this person about your business.  You grow together.  You get better results when you have a regular, stable set of contributors.

The key to success with hiring your own employees is training.  In some cases you will hire people who already have the skills that you require of them.  But in many cases, because of the varying nature of online businesses, you will want to hire people with great english skills and high general intelligence.  People with these skills will be able to learn whatever you need them to learn in order to help you grow yoru business.

 

Full time, regular employees at $2.50 per hour. 

The cost to do this can be incredibly effective.  In the Philippines, for example, you can generally hire a full time Virtual Assistant with excellent English skills for about $300 to $400 per month.  That works out to about $2.50 per hour.

We give you a completely free way to connect with talent.  

We’re like Google for online entrepreneurs looking to hire talent.  Go ahead and use our job seeker search engine for free.  Take advantage of the training we provide for you.  We’re happy to help teach you how to post jobs, screen candidates and make hiring decisions.  We give you lots of high quality (and free) training on how to grow your online business.

You are responsible for paying your employees.  

We stay out of the financial details between you and your employees.  You interview them, you hire them and you pay them.  We suggest you use PayPal to make payments.  We help you find the people and we give you training.  The rest is up to you.  

Sign up for your free account.  

We’ll have more training that teaches you on how to interview, hire and arrange monthly payments for your workers.  

 

Job Seekers


How We Can HelpYou Find the Perfect Online Job


OutsourceFactor connects job seekers with great employers

 

It’s very easy to find an online job these days. 

If you have your own computer and an Internet connection, you can offer your talent to an employer anywhere in the world.  We give you an easy way to find an online job.  

Full time and part time jobs.

No commission jobs.  The employers posting jobs at OutsourceFactor are looking to hire regular employees.  They will offer you a regular job with a monthly salary.

Regular pay.  

Employers at OutsourceFactor are expected to offer you a job with regular pay.  It’s up to you to discuss these terms with your boss.  Usually you’ll arrange payment once per month or once every two weeks.  

No fees. 

We don’t charge you any money to use our site.   You will never be asked to pay any money to apply for a job.  

Work from home. 

Our employers are looking for talented people like you to work from home.  Most of the work is web based.  You could be helping write website content, do search engine optimization, or other specialized skills such as programming or graphics.  You might help with customer support, or do web research for your employer.  Every employer has different needs.  But all of these jobs are legitimate work from home jobs.  

Sign up for your free account. 

We’ll give you lots more training.  You need a free account to be able to post your profile, contact employers and apply for jobs. We’ll help you every step of the way!

fields.title: Privacy Policy
fields.content:
OutsourceFactor.com Privacy Policy:

 The short version of our privacy policy is that we aren’t going to rent or sell your private information to anyone.  As a user of our site, we respect your privacy and we hate spam.  Yes, we will contact you by email with updates.  But you’ll have a way to opt-out if you are not interested in our educational content, tips, training, etc.  

Jobseeker: When you publish a profile to the site, the general public and/or search engines cannot see your contact information.  Only other registered users can see the email address that you provide in your profile. Each individual email address is only made visible to a user who has already registered and logged-in to our

Business: When you publish a profile details to the site, the general public and/or search engines cannot see your contact information.  You have an option to leave an alternative contact info when posting a job which will be public to all visitors.

When you register for an account on OutsourceFactor, or if you use the site as a non-registered user, you consent to the use of your personal information as described here.

 

Personal Information

When you register for an account, we ask you for personal details such as your name, age, country, email address and more.  We collect this information to help our users (job seekers and employers) to connect with each other for the purposes of conducting business.  We will not rent or sell this information to third parties.

 

How we Use Email Addresses

OutsourceFactor needs your email address to complete your registration.  We use your email address to do the following:

  1. A confirmation email will be sent to you so we can verify that you are the owner of the email address you registered with.  We’ll do this every time you change your email address. 
  2. Education or training content will be sent to you on occasion.  We do this to help you.  You can opt-out in your user profile.  We may email you to let you know about new features on the site, suggestions to improve your chances of being hired, or finding a job, etc.  
  3. Promotional emails may also be sent.  We will likely recommend products or services to you that we feel will help you in your business or job search.  Again, you can opt out in your user profile.
  4. Commercial email may be sent.  This may include products, features or services that OutsourceFactor offers to you.  You are under no obligations to transact with us, and you can opt out from these too.  
  5. Correspondence between users.  You may get email from us notifying you of correspondence between yourself and another member of the site.  This includes correspondence from existing and yet-to-be-created features on our website.

 

Other Information That We Collect

We may collect other information that helps us, but does not personally identify you.  We track information such as your IP address, the browser you use and the pages you visit on our site.  We also use cookies as explained below.

IP Address:  We track this for administrative purposes.  For example, it helps us to identify which countries are visitors come from.  There are many analytical reasons for us to gather this information.  Your IP address does not personally identify you.  

Browser information:  It is helpful for us to know which Internet browsers are most common among users.  This enables us to design our site to serve you better. 

Cookies: an HTTP cookie, or web cookie, is a piece of data stored by a website within a browser, and then subsequently sent back to the same website by the browser.  Cookies help our website to remember what actions you have taken on our site within your browser.  Cookies cannot install viruses or malware on your computer. Most computer browsers allow you to disable cookies.  Services at OutsourceFactor.com that require a login will require the use of cookies. 

Third Parties:

OutsourceFacor.com uses third parties for many of our services.  This includes web hosting, file storage, email transmission, payment processing, and data analysis.  Third parties are permitted only to use your personal data to allow them to provide services to you directly related to your account at OutsourceFactor.  If you believe your data has been compromised, please contact us.

 

Obligations, Legal Requests and Monitoring

OutsourceFactor maintains no obligations to monitor any user data or use of the website.  We maintain no obligation to keep backups of your data in the event of a system failure.  We recommend that anything important you post to our site be backed up elsewhere.  This is your responsibility.  We reserve the right to share any data with applicable law enforcement agencies, if required.   

Other Websites

Our privacy statement is applicable only to OutsourceFactor.com.  You need to realize that we will provide links to other websites in the course of publishing content.  If you visit these other sites you are subject to their privacy policies, and not ours.  

This is the Internet. Bad stuff can happen. 

The Internet is not 100% reliable or secure.  We do a lot to protect your personal information, but we can’t guarantee its safety.  If your personal data is stolen or otherwise compromised, we hold no responsibility.  We are not liable for any unauthorized use of your personal information.  You use our services and website at your own risk. 

 

Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy statement (or anything else), contact us.  Our email address is support@OutsourceFactor.com and our mailing address is:

Outsourcefactor.com
133 Weber St N - Suite 3-240
Waterloo, ON N2J 3G9 Canada
Phone: 1.226.476.1804

fields.title: Terms of Service
fields.content:
Terms of Service:

 

Thanks for using our products and services (“Services”). The Services are provided by Outsourcefactor.

By using our Services, you are agreeing to these terms. Please read them carefully.

 

  •  You meet the legal working age in your country
  •  You will respect the privacy of others
  • You will use this site ONLY to find meaningful online jobs if you are a job seeker
  • You will use this site ONLY to find remote virtual talents if you are an employer
  • You will communicate clearly and directly with potential employers and/or employees
  • You will NOT create duplicate accounts
  • You will NOT add inappropriate website links to your account
  •  We reserve the right to cancel your account for any reason, at our sole discretion.  


This is our way of telling you that these terms are intended to be simple, and we expect you to act like a professional.   

Outsourcefactor brings employers and job seekers together.  We do not handle hiring of candidates, recommending candidates or financial transactions between employers and hired candidates.  It is your responsibility to communicate, interview, hire, train and pay your workers.

If you agree to the above, then we hope you enjoy using our services.


Thank you,

The Outsourcefactor Team!

fields.title: Welcome Warriors!
fields.content:
Welcome Warriors! 

OutsourceFactor.com was custom-built as a place to get training on outsourcing.  We're also a full-featured job site, allowing job seekers to post resumes.  We're NOT charging for this at all.  Later we'll introduce paid features and paid training.  But right now everything is 100% free and there will ALWAYS be a very valuable free tier to the service.

Free primer on outsourcing - PDF: 

We've just launched.  And to support that launch I've created a great outsourcing "primer" for you.  Here is a very short video showing you how the site works and where you can grab your training.  Go ahead and watch the video.  Get your account.  Grab your free training.   

Quick Overview
